name: uri-js

1.4.0.name: uri-js
1.4.0.description: An RFC 3986 compliant, scheme extendable URI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

1.4.2.name: uri-js
1.4.2.description: An RFC 3986 compliant, scheme extendable URI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

2.0.0.name: uri-js
2.0.0.description: An RFC 3986/3987 compliant, scheme extendable URI/IRI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

2.1.0.name: uri-js
2.1.0.description: An RFC 3986/3987 compliant, scheme extendable URI/IRI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

2.1.1.name: uri-js
2.1.1.description: An RFC 3986/3987 compliant, scheme extendable URI/IRI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

3.0.0.name: uri-js
3.0.0.description: An RFC 3986/3987 compliant, scheme extendable URI/IRI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

scripts.build:es5: rollup -c && cp dist/esnext/uri.d.ts dist/es5/uri.all.d.ts && npm run build:es5:fix-sourcemap
scripts.build:es5:min: uglifyjs dist/es5/uri.all.js --support-ie8 --output dist/es5/uri.all.min.js --in-source-map dist/es5/uri.all.js.map --source-map uri.all.min.js.map --comments --compress --mangle --pure-funcs merge subexp  && mv uri.all.min.js.map dist/es5/ && cp dist/es5/uri.all.d.ts dist/es5/uri.all.min.d.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:esnext && npm run build:es5 && npm run build:es5:min

3.0.1.name: uri-js
3.0.1.description: An RFC 3986/3987 compliant, scheme extendable URI/IRI parsing/validating/resolving library for JavaScript.

scripts.build: npm run build:esnext && npm run build:es5 && npm run build:es5:min

scripts.build:es5: rollup -c && cp dist/esnext/uri.d.ts dist/es5/uri.all.d.ts && npm run build:es5:fix-sourcemap
scripts.build:es5:min: uglifyjs dist/es5/uri.all.js --support-ie8 --output dist/es5/uri.all.min.js --in-source-map dist/es5/uri.all.js.map --source-map uri.all.min.js.map --comments --compress --mangle --pure-funcs merge subexp  && mv uri.all.min.js.map dist/es5/ && cp dist/es5/uri.all.d.ts dist/es5/uri.all.min.d.ts
